info.title: Mashvisor
info.description: Mashvisor APIs allow you to conduct real estate market analysis of any US housing market for both long term rental properties (traditional rentals) and short term rental properties (Airbnb rentals). Furthermore, you get access to nationwide real estate data for traditional rental listings as well as Airbnb listings. The data includes but is not limited to price estimate of MLS listings and off market properties, traditional rental rates (rental income), recurring rental expenses, Airbnb nightly rates, Airbnb occupancy rate, Airbnb rental income traditional and Airbnb return on investment including cash flow, cash on cash return, and cap rate.

get.description: The endpoint will fetch all listings in a city or in a zip code with their IDs and addresses whether they are active on the market, or off-market

parameters.name: zip_code
parameters.description: Property zip code

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The property Id from the Mashvisor database.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Property street address

parameters.name: parcel_number
parameters.description: Property parcel or APN

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: Property city

parameters.name: mls_id
parameters.description: Property MLS id

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: The state of the property should be provided to the api or api will throw error 404

get.description: This endpoint retrieves the property's detailed data set stored in Mashvisor database.

post.description: Get recommended properties specs based on Mashvisor AI recommender score, read more about the score in the API details section.
Get neighborhood Mashmeter value, see more about the score in the API details section.
Get investment likelihood score for a property, read more about the score in API details section.

get.description: This endpoint retrieves snapshot data about a specific property.

parameters.name: is_days
parameters.description: If it's set to 0, the \"traditional_occupancy\" is considered as a percentage, if it's 1, it's considered as num of days per year

parameters.description: Turnover cost

parameters.description: Sets the property listing price to its value

parameters.description: Monthly Airbnb rental income, ex: 2000

parameters.name: airbnb_occupancy
parameters.description: num of days per year, or a percentage Based on \"is_days\" param, eg: 70 as a percentage, or 150 as days

parameters.name: traditional_occupancy
parameters.description: num of days per year, or a percentage Based on \"is_days\" param, eg: 70 as a percentage, or 150 as days

parameters.name: recurring_cost
parameters.description: Recurring cost of the investment strategy, ex: 1435

parameters.description: The state of the property should be provided to the api or api will throw error 404.

parameters.name: startup_cost
parameters.description: Startup cost for the investment, e.x: 8000

parameters.description: Defines the monthly calculations should be calculated for \"Airbnb\" or \"Traditional\"
